title: Can you tell me about the dredging project that is going on in the river in front of PPD?
text:
A river dredging project south of the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge was
finished by the Corps of Engineers a couple of months ago.

There is a dredging project planned at the Bennett Brothers Yacht
marina on the NE Cape Fear River, but it hasn't started yet. More on
that here:

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100523/ARTICLES/100529850
